past_courses.justification: Introduces supervised and unsupervised learning methods foundational to ESP3201A.
Covers matrix algebra and vector spaces important to understanding optimization and model representations.
Provides statistical foundations (estimation, variance) which are prerequisites for many ML models.
Covers optimization algorithms relevant for training machine learning models.

direct_oulu_links.justification: Frequency and time domain analysis knowledge provides mathematical maturity useful for ML signal processing.
Direct overlap with dimensionality reduction and multivariate data analysis concepts.

direct_oulu_links.course_name: Introduction to Regression and Analysis of Variance
direct_oulu_links.justification: Regression analysis is a core ML method; Ouluâ€™s course reinforces this statistical foundation.
